title: Replacing the cult of the entrepreneur
description: The development of the Moderna vaccine was the culmination of decades of scientific research. This research was able to flourish thanks in large part to Flagship Pioneering and its founder, Noubar Afeyan. Today, the innovative way Flagship created one of the most successful COVID-19 vaccine makers in the world.
